The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks came into Wednesday 's contest on a two - game losing streak , but they were able to bounce back with a win over the Magic . Paul Millsap led the way for Atlanta with 20 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , to go along with four rebounds , four assists and two steals , in 35 minutes . Al Horford added 17 points and 13 rebounds in 31 minutes , while Jeff Teague chipped in 17 points , seven assists and seven rebounds . DeMarre Carroll chipped in 15 points and eight rebounds of his own , and Kyle Korver chipped in eight points . Atlanta has now won three of its last four games , as it continues to battle for the eighth seed in the Eastern Conference . Orlando has now lost four of their last five games . Nikola Vucevic led the team with 19 points and 15 rebounds in the loss . Elfrid Payton was the only other Magic player in double figures , with 15 points on 5 - for - 15 shooting . Channing Frye added 10 points and 10 rebounds in 37 minutes off the bench . On deck for the Magic is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . Meanwhile , the Hawks will look to extend their winning streak to five games on Friday when they host the New York Knicks .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 18 - 17 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 5 - 31 ) 95 - 82 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Bucks have now won four of their last five games , as they continue to battle for a playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . Khris Middleton led the way for Milwaukee , scoring 17 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting , to go along with five rebounds and four assists . Giannis Antetokounmpo added 16 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals . Brandon Knight followed up with 17 points and five assists , while Greg Monroe chipped in 16 points off the bench . Zaza Pachulia added 10 points and seven rebounds . Milwaukee shot 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . Tim Hardaway Jr. led the Knicks in scoring , tallying 17 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds  and four steals , in 38 minutes . JR Smith was next with 15 points . Cole Aldrich added 12 points and eight rebounds ; Jose Calderon chipped in seven points ; and Courtney Lee and Lance Thomas combined for 15 points off of the bench as well . New York has now lost three straight games . They will look to get back on track on Friday in a home matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 5 - 1 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 3 - 2 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix . The Grizzlies got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Suns 27 - 19 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the second half , as they held a double - digit lead going into the final period . Memphis was led by Mike Conley , who scored a game - high 24 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting . He also added six rebounds and six assists . Marc Gasol was right behind him with 18 points , six rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Zach Randolph was next with a 15 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two blocks . Courtney Lee was the only other starter in double figures , scoring 11 points . Mike Conley finished with nine points ; he also dished out six assists and recorded two steals . Jon Leuer led the second unit with 11 points and four rebounds . Eric Bledsoe led the way for Phoenix with 23 points in 36 minutes , which he supplemented with four rebounds and four assists in the loss . Markieff Morris finished with 20 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and five assists ; Miles Plumlee was next in line with 18 minutes . Goran Dragic scored six points in 26 minutes off the bench , but shot just 3 - of- 9 from the field . Phoenix will look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers .
The Toronto Raptors ( 29 - 15 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 17 - 28 ) 114 - 110 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors with 25 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , to go along with six rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block , in 35 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas added 20 points and 11 rebounds in 28 minutes , while Kyle Lowry chipped in 11 points , eight assists and eight rebounds . The Raptors shot 53 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range . Detroit was led by Greg Monroe , who finished with 21 points and 13 rebounds in 35 mins . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope followed up with 16 points and six assists . Andre Drummond finished with 14 points and 16 rebounds in 34 minutes ; he also had four steals . Jon Leuer led the bench with 12 points . Kyle Singler finished with 12 , and Ish Smith chipped in 12 points off the bench . On deck for the Pistons is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . Toronto has won three of their last four games , as they continue to battle for the eighth seed in the Eastern Conference . They 'll look to extend their winning streak to five games on Friday when they take on the Indiana Pacers .
The Detroit Pistons ( 30 - 29 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 24 - 35 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Pistons have now won three straight games , as they continue to battle for a playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . They were led by Tobias Harris , who scored a game - high 22 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting , to go along with eight rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Andre Drummond added 15 points , 10 rebounds and two blocks , while Reggie Jackson chipped in 15 points and seven assists . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope chipped in 12 points and four assists , and Jon Leuer chipped in 10 points off the bench . Detroit shot a solid 42 percent from the field , but was out - rebounded by the Bucks , 49 - 38 . Khris Middleton led the way for Milwaukee , with 26 points and six rebounds . Giannis Antetokounmpo was right behind him with a double - double of his own , scoring eight points and grabbing 12 boards . Jabari Parker was next with 13 points and five rebounds in 34 minutes , along with five assists and two steals . O.J . Mayo was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with nine points . Milwaukee has now lost four of its last five games and sits in last place in the Western Conference 's Central Division . Next up , the Bucks will travel to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Friday . Meanwhile , Detroit will head home to face the Los Angeles Clippers on Saturday .

The Bucks got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Cavaliers 30 - 17 in the first quarter . They never looked back , as they went on to out - score the Cavaliers 54 - 37 in the second half . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee , scoring a game - high 35 points on 13 - of - 19 shooting . Jabari Parker was next with 18 points , while John Henson recorded a double - double with seven points and nine rebounds . Greg Monroe led the second unit with 17 points off the bench , and the Bucks shot 54 percent from the field as a team . Cleveland was led by LeBron James , who scored a team - high 29 points . He also added eight rebounds and seven assists . Kevin Love was right behind him with a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - doubles . Kyrie Irving scored 13 points but shot just 4 - for - 16 . Tristan Thompson was the only other Cavalier to score in double figures , finishing with six points and seven rebounds , in 29 minutes . Up next for the Cavaliers is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . Milwaukee is off until Friday , when they host the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 4 - 1 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 4 ) 101 - 93 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . LeBron James and Kyrie Irving led the way for the Cavaliers , as they combined for 62 points . James finished with 27 points , 11 rebounds and 11 assists , while Irving added 27 points of his own . Kevin Love added 21 points and 10 rebounds , and Timofey Mozgov chipped in 11 points and 11 rebounds . The Cavaliers shot 40 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . Boston was led by Avery Bradley , who finished with 16 points on 6 - of - 13 shooting . Tyler Zeller finished with eight points and four rebounds in 29 minutes . Kelly Olynyk led the second unit with 17 points and nine rebounds ; Jae Crowder finished with seven points and five rebounds in 17 minutes off the bench . Evan Turner finished with 15 points and seven assists . Up next , the Cavaliers will host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . Meanwhile , Boston will travel to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday night . This was the second game of a back - to - back set for the Celtics , after they lost to the New York Knicks on Tuesday . They 'll look to bounce back in their next game , which will take place at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Saturday .

The Grizzlies ( 1 - 1 ) were able to hold off the Timberwolves in the fourth quarter , as Zach Randolph and Marc Gasol combined for 25 points in the final 12 minutes . Randolph finished with 25 points on 12 - of - 16 shooting and 13 rebounds , while Gasol finished with 32 points , 10 rebounds and three blocks . Mike Conley added 16 points and six assists , and Courtney Lee finished with 14 points and three rebounds . Memphis was able to shoot 52 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range , compared to Minnesota 's 45 percent shooting from the floor and 30 percent from beyond the arc . Ricky Rubio led the way for the Timberwolves ( 0 - 0 ) with 12 points and eight assists . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 26 points on 10 - for - 19 shooting , along with eight rebounds and four assists ; Nikola Pekovic finished with 13 points and nine rebounds ; and Shabazz Muhammad led the bench with 18 points . Zach LaVine was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 11 points on 4 - of- 8 shooting . Minnesota will return home to host the Golden State Warriors on Friday , with Game 2 taking place on Saturday .

The Nets got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Wizards 31 - 14 in the first quarter . They never looked back , as they led by as many as 26 points in the second quarter , and the Wizards could n't get it back to single digits after that . Brook Lopez led the way for the Nets , scoring 26 points ( 12 - 22 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) to go along with nine rebounds , two assists and one steal . He 's now averaging 22 points and 9 rebounds over his last three games . Deron Williams was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with nine points ( 3 - 11 FG ) , nine assists , seven rebounds and two steals . It was a nice bounce - back game for Williams , who 's had a rough stretch of late , averaging just 9 points and 3 assists over that span . Joe Johnson was second on the team with seven points , three rebounds and three assists . Thaddeus Young had 10 points ( 5 - 8 FG ), four rebounds and one assist . Bojan Bogdanovic led the bench with 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG ). The Wizards were led by Bradley Beal 's 24 points ( 10 - 19 FG  , 1 - 2 3Pte , 4 - 4 FT ), which he supplemented with five rebounds . Marcin Gortat had a double - double of his own , totaling 11 points and 14 rebounds ; he 's averaging 10 points and 10 rebounds on the year . Nene Hilario had a nice game off the bench , posting 14 points and seven rebounds in 25 minutes . Washington 's next game will be on the road against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Nets will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday .

It will look to extend its winning streak to seven games on Friday when it takes on the Indiana Pacers . Washington has now lost four of their last five games . Gorgui Dieng finished with 22 points and 12 rebounds in 35 minutes . Andrew Wiggins scored 20 points and added seven rebounds and four assists ; Mo Williams scored 17 points and dished out seven assists in 25 minutes , while Thaddeus Young scored 13 points and grabbed five rebounds in 30 minutes ; but the rest of the starters combined for just 17 points .

The Pelicans got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Bucks 32 - 18 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the second half , as the Bucks could n't get anything going on the offensive end , shooting just 37 percent from the field and 27 percent from three - point range . In fact , the Pelicans shot just 35 percent on the night , while the Bucks shot 37 percent on their end . New Orleans was led by Anthony Davis , who scored 20 points ( 6 - 18 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 8 - 12 FT ) to go along with 12 rebounds , two assists and one steal . He 's now averaging 26 points and 12 rebounds on the season . Tyreke Evans was next with 12 points ( 5 - 18FG , 2 - 9 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ), eight assists , four rebounds and two steals . It was his second double - double in a row , and he 's averaging 12 points and 6 assists over his last three games . Quincy Pondexter was right behind him with 18 points , seven rebounds and three assists . As a team , New Orleans shot 35 percent and hit 10 three - pointers . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks with 15 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) , eight rebounds and four assists ; he 'll look to keep it going on Friday in a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers . Denver was able to hold off the Pelicans in the final period , however , as Tyreke Evans missed a three - pointer at the buzzer to seal the win for the Nuggets . Kenneth Faried led the way for Denver , finishing with 19 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , 10 rebounds and two blocks . He 's now averaging 14 points and 10 rebounds on the season . Ty Lawson was right behind him with 20 points ( 9 - 13 FG ) and six assists . Arron Afflalo finished with 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG ), four rebounds and three assists , while Wilson Chandler had 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG ). The Nuggets have now won three of their last four games . They 'll look to keep rolling on Friday in a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 24 points ( 8 - 15 FG  , 0 - 1 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ), 12 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Davis has now scored at least 24 points in four of his last five games , and he 's averaging 28 points and 12 rebounds over that span . Eric Gordon was next with 11 points ( 4 - 15 , 5 - 6 FG ; 2 - 3 3 3P , 6 - 6 FT ). He also had six assists and six rebounds . Jrue Holiday was productive off the bench as well , scoring 11 points and dishing out four assists in 29 minutes . New Orleans will look to bounce back on Friday when they take on the Sacramento Kings .
The Los Angeles Lakers ( 3 - 3 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) 117 - 97 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Lakers got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Warriors 31 - 16 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , as they never trailed by more than 10 points . Los Angeles was led by Julius Randle , who scored 20 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) to go along with 14 rebounds , two assists and one steal . D'Angelo Russell was next with 17 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) , four rebounds and four assists . Julius Randle added 14 points and 14 rebounds of his own , while Nick Young chipped in 12 points , three rebounds and three assists in 24 minutes off the bench . Timofey Mozgov added 16 points and five rebounds in 25 minutes , and Lou Williams chipped in 13 points ( 6 - 13 FG ), six rebounds and two assists in 29 minutes . For the Warriors , Stephen Curry led the way with 34 points ( 12 - 26 FG  , 1 - 2 3Pte , 4 - 4 FT ). Kevin Durant followed up with 20 points and 10 rebounds . Klay Thompson was next in line with 18 points ( 7 - 17 FG ). Draymond Green added 16 ( 6 ) and eight assists , but shot just 4 - for - 10 from the field . Golden State will look to bounce back on Friday when they take on the Houston Rockets in their next game . Meanwhile , the Lakers will have a few days off before hosting the Phoenix Suns on Friday .

The Trail Blazers were expected to win this game easily , but the Knicks were able to come away with the win . The Chicago Bulls defeated the Boston Celtics , 105 - 99 , in Game 1 of their Eastern Conference first - round playoff series at United Center on Wednesday . The Bulls ( 1 - 1 ) were expected to win this game easily , but the Celtics were able to keep it close throughout . In fact , the Celtics led for the majority of the game , as they held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . However , Chicago was able to pull away in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Celtics 30 - 22 to seal the win . Dwyane Wade led the way for the Bulls , scoring 22 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting , to go along with five rebounds and five assists . Jimmy Butler followed up with 24 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals . Rajon Rondo was the only other starter to score in double figures , finishing with four points and nine assists in 33 minutes . Jae Crowder led the Celtics in scoring , totaling 14 points and five rebounds . Al Horford finished second on the team with 16 points and 10 rebounds in the loss . Boston will look to even the series in Game 2 on Friday , when they host the Toronto Raptors . Chicago has been one of the best home teams in the NBA over the last two years , and this win shows just how good they can be at home . Up next , they 'll look to extend their home winning streak to seven games on Friday against the New Orleans Pelicans .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 55 - 16 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 40 - 32 ) 97 - 90 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . San Antonio has now won three straight games , as they continue to battle for the top seed in the Western Conference . The Spurs shot 48 percent from the field , while the Grizzlies shot just 44 percent . Kawhi Leonard led the way for San Antonio with 19 points , seven rebounds and four assists . LaMarcus Aldridge added 23 points and seven rebounds . Tony Parker added 13 points and eight assists , and Patty Mills chipped in 15 points off the bench . Memphis was led by Mike Conley , who finished with 22 points . Marc Gasol followed up with 13 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , eight rebounds and seven assists ; while Vince Carter chipped in nine points ( 4 - 7 FG ) and seven boards . JaMychal Green was the only other Grizzlies player to score in double figures , finishing with eight points ( 3 - 5 FG ), four rebounds , two assists and two steals .Memphis remains in second place in the West . They head to Oklahoma City to take on the Thunder on Friday . For the Spurs , it was a night to forget for Kawhi Leonard . Leonard shot 7 - 15 from the floor and 2 - 5 from the three - point line to score 19 points in 38 minutes . He 's now averaging 19 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Manu Ginobili was held out of the game with a sore left ankle . Ginobili is expected to be out until at least Friday , when the Spurs host the Los Angeles Clippers .

The Pelicans got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 30 - 17 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on throughout the rest of the game , as they held a double - digit lead for the majority of the second half . New Orleans was led by Anthony Davis , who finished with 28 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 11 - 16 FT ) , 16 rebounds , four assists and two steals in 37 minutes . He 's now averaging 28 points and 16 rebounds on the season . Jrue Holiday was next with 16 points ( 7 - 18 FG ) and 11 assists in 36 minutes , while Buddy Hield finished with 14 points ( 6 - 8 FG ), nine rebounds and four assists in 23 minutes ; he 's averaging 14 points and 4 assists on the year . It was his second double - double in the last three games . Dante Cunningham was the only other Pelican in double figures , finishing with 11 points ( 4 - 7 FG  , 1 - 2 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ), six rebounds and six assists in 37 mins . This was the Mavericks ' fourth loss in their last five games , and they 'll look to get back on track on Friday in a road matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers . Dallas has been struggling recently , but this was a much needed win for them . Dirk Nowitzki was the high - point man for the Mavericks , with 24 points ( 10 - 18FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ). Harrison Barnes was second on the team with 15 points , five rebounds and three assists . Wesley Matthews finished with 17 points ( 5 - 13 FG ). The Mavericks will look to build off this win on Friday against the Los Angeles Clippers .

This marks the second time this season that the Clippers have won three in a row .

Montrezl Harrell was next with 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG ). The Rockets shot 45 percent from the field , while the Magic shot 42 percent . Orlando was led by Evan Fournier 's 10 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds and nine assists . Aaron Gordon followed with 18 points ( seven - 14 FG  , 3 - 6 3Pte , 6 - 6 FT ), while Serge Ibaka had 16 points and 12 rebounds ; he also had three steals , two blocks and one block . Elfrid Payton had 12 points and six assists in 25 minutes . Bismack Biyombo was the only other Magic player to score in double figures , with 20 points ( 2 - 3 FG ; 0 - 1 3Pter , 5 - 5 FT ). Orlando will look to get back on track on Friday when they host the Los Angeles Clippers .
The Golden State Warriors ( 3 - 2 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 2 - 3 ) 98 - 78 in Game 5 of the Western Conference first - round playoffs on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . Golden State has now won three straight games . The Warriors were able to pull away in the third quarter , out - scoring the Grizzlies 26 - 16 . They were led by Klay Thompson , who finished with 21 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting . Stephen Curry was right behind him with 18 points , five rebounds and five assists . Draymond Green finished with seven points and nine rebounds , while Andrew Bogut had a 24 - point , 9 - rebound double - double . Memphis was led by Zach Randolph , whose 18 points and 10 rebounds were a career - high . Marc Gasol finished with 13 points and seven rebounds . Mike Conley was next with 12 points . Courtney Lee was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 10 points and six rebounds  . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 102 - 98 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . The Grizzlies ( 29 - 11 ) have now won three straight games , as they continue to battle for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference . Zach Randolph led the way for Memphis with 20 points and 15 rebounds . Marc Gasol added 15 points and eight rebounds , while Beno Udrih chipped in 17 points and seven assists . Memphis shot 51 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range . Damian Lillard led the Trail Blazers with 23 points , nine assists , four rebounds and two steals . C.J . McCollum chipped in 18 points off the bench , and LaMarcus Aldridge added 18 points . Portland has now lost four of their last five games . They 'll look to bounce back on Sunday when they host the Los Angeles Clippers .Memphis will look to extend its winning streak to five games on Saturday when they take on the New Orleans Pelicans , who are currently in second place in the Eastern Conference , in the second half of a back - to - back set . This marks the second time this season that the Grizzlies have won three in a row , but they 'll have to do it without Mike Conley , whose knee injury has kept him out of the lineup for the last three games and is expected to be out until at least the end of the month .

The Trail Blazers were expected to win this game easily , but the Raptors were able to pull away in the fourth quarter . McCollum scored 24 points ( 6 - 17 FG ; 4 - 5 FT ), and Al-Farouq Aminu added 12 points ( 5 - 13 FG  , 1 - 2 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ). The Portland Trail Blazers ( 7 - 3 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 4 - 5 ) 97 - 87 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Nets 30 - 17 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the Nets to just 39 percent shooting from the field in the game . Damian Lillard led the way for Portland , scoring 28 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , to go along with 10 assists , five rebounds and two steals in 38 minutes . Wesley Matthews was next with 10 points , while C.J . McCollum chipped in 12 points off the bench . Robin Lopez was the only other Trail Blazer in double figures , as he scored 10 points and grabbed seven rebounds in 30 minutes of action . For the Nets , Bojan Bogdanovic led the team in scoring , finishing with 21 points on 10 - of- 17 shooting . Joe Johnson was next in line with 20 points . Brook Lopez and Kevin Garnett were next with matching 12 - point efforts , with the former adding seven rebounds , two assists and a steal , and the latter adding five rebounds . Deron Williams finished with eight points and seven assists . Sean Kilpatrick led the second unit with 12 points and four rebounds in 18 minutes , but the Nets shot just 39 per cent from the floor . Brooklyn will look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers . Portland will look for their third straight win on Friday against the New Orleans Pelicans .

The Chicago Bulls ( 3 - 1 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 0 - 4 ) 98 - 90 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Magic 30 - 17 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game and hold on for the win . Jimmy Butler led the way for Chicago , scoring 21 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting from the field . He also added nine rebounds , three assists and two steals . Pau Gasol added 16 points and 13 rebounds in 41 minutes . Taj Gibson was the only other Bulls player to score in double figures , finishing with 16 points , four rebounds and four assists . Nikola Vucevic led the Magic in scoring , totaling 21 points and 15 rebounds . Evan Fournier finished with 13 points and six assists , while Elfrid Payton had a modest 11 points . Tobias Harris was the lone bright spot for Orlando , as he finished with 21 points in 37 minutes , but the team shot just 43 percent on the night . Orlando will look to get back on track on Friday in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans . Chicago will host the New York Knicks on Friday , in the second game of a back - to - back set .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 34 - 19 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 21 - 33 ) 104 - 87 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Spurs have now won three straight games , as they continue to build on their Western Conference lead . Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Spurs with a game - high 28 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , six assists , two steals and a block . Tony Parker followed up with 17 points and eight assists . Danny Green chipped in with 19 points and six rebounds of his own , while Tim Duncan added 12 points and nine rebounds . San Antonio shot 48 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range . Detroit has now lost four straight games as they try to find their way back into the playoff picture . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the team with 20 points and four rebounds ; he also added three assists and three steals . D.J . Augustin followed with 22 points . Andre Drummond posted a 10 - point , 9 - rebound double - double , and Greg Monroe added six points and five rebounds  . Jon Leuer led the second unit with 12 points off the bench . On deck for the Pistons is a road matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . Meanwhile , the Spurs will look to extend their winning streak to three games on Friday when they take on the New Orleans Pelicans .
The Golden State Warriors ( 36 - 7 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 30 - 17 ) 111 - 113 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors came into Wednesday 's contest as the league 's hottest team , having won six of their last seven games . They did n't disappoint in this one , however , as they were able to hold off a late charge from the Bulls . In fact , Golden State led by as many as 20 points in the fourth quarter , but Chicago fought back to make it a one - point game with just over a minute remaining . Draymond Green was able to hit two free throws to put the Warriors up by two , and the Bulls had a chance to tie the game at the buzzer . However , Derrick Rose missed a three - pointer at the end of the game that would have sent the game to overtime . Klay Thompson led the way for Golden State with 30 points ( 13 - 27 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block . Stephen Curry was right behind him with 21 points ( 9 - 23 FG ) and nine assists . Marreese Speights was next with a 10 - point , 8 - rebound double - double , while Harrison Barnes chipped in 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG ), five rebounds and five assists of his own . Andre Iguodala was productive off the bench as well , scoring 24 points ( 10 - 17 FG ). The Bulls were led by Pau Gasol , who finished with 18 points ( 7 - 12 FG  , 1 - 2 3Pte , 4 - 4 FT ), 12 rebounds and four assists in 41 minutes . Joakim Noah was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG .<n> Derrick Rose finished with 13 points ( 6 - 12FG , 0 - 1 3Pter , 2 - 2 FT ). Nikola Mirotic led the second unit with 12 points , four rebounds and one assist . Chicago will look to get back on track on Friday in a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers . Golden State will host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 21 - 45 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 44 - 21 ) 99 - 96 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Timberwolves got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Thunder 32 - 19 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the entirety of the second half , but the Thunder were not able to get anything going in the third quarter , as the Timberwolves outscored the Thunder 30 - 19 to take a nine - point lead heading into the final period . Kevin Durant was the player of the game for the Thunder , finishing with 28 points ( 11 - 20 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , six rebounds and six assists in 38 minutes . Russell Westbrook was second on the team with 26 points ( 8 - 19 FG ) and eight assists in 37 minutes , while Enes Kanter was the only other player in double figures with 17 points ( 7 - 14 FG ), eight rebounds , two assists and two steals in 21 minutes off the bench . Oklahoma City has now lost four of their last five games , and they 're currently in last place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . Karl-Anthony Towns led the way for the Timberwolves with 25 points ( 9 - 15 FG  , 1 - 2 3Pte , 5 - 5 FT ), 12 rebounds and three assists in 35 minutes of action . Andrew Wiggins was right behind him with 20 points , eight rebounds and four assists in 40 minutes ; Zach LaVine was next with 17 ( 8 – 13 FG ; 1 - 3 3Pter , 2 - 2 FT ). The Timberwolves will look to keep their playoff hopes alive on Friday in a home matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers . Meanwhile , the Thunder will look for their third straight win on Friday against the New Orleans Pelicans .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 104 - 84 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday . The Thunder ( 3 - 3 ) have been one of the most impressive teams in the NBA this season , as they have won three straight games . They have been led by superstar Kevin Durant , who scored 36 points on 11 - of - 23 shooting , to go along with seven rebounds , four assists and two steals , in 36 minutes . Durant has now scored 30 or more points in four straight games for the first time in his career . All five starters scored in double figures for the Thunder , with Enes Kanter leading the way with 15 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Russell Westbrook was next with 16 points and eight assists , while Kevin Durant added 14 points and seven rebounds of his own . On deck for Oklahoma City is a home matchup against the San Antonio Spurs on Friday . For the Grizzlies ( 3 -1 ) , they have now lost two straight games after a strong start to the season . Marc Gasol led the team with 17 points and five rebounds in 33 minutes , but the team shot just 37 percent from the field . Mike Conley was the only other Grizzlies player to score in double digits , scoring 13 points . Memphis will look to bounce back on Friday when they host the New Orleans Pelicans for their next game .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 9 - 12 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 8 - 11 ) 109 - 103 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Trail Blazers got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Timberwolves 32 - 21 in the first quarter . They were able to hold off the Timberwolves in the second quarter , however , to take a nine - point lead into the half . In the second half , the Trail Blazers were just too much for the Timberwolves , as they out - scored them 51 - 34 . Damian Lillard led the way for Portland , scoring a game - high 25 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting . He also added seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . C.J . McCollum was right behind him with 17 points , five rebounds and five assists . Al-Farouq Aminu was second on the team with 16 points and eight rebounds . Mason Plumlee had 14 points and 12 rebounds , while Maurice Harkless chipped in 13 points off the bench . For Minnesota , Karl-Anthony Towns was the player of the game . Towns scored 27 points on 13 - 21 shooting and grabbed 12 rebounds in 32 minutes . Andrew Wiggins was right beside him with a 17 - point , 5 - rebound double - double . Kevin Martin was next with 11 points and four rebounds ; Ricky Rubio had nine points and 15 assists ; and Shabazz Muhammad had 12 points and five rebounds  . Minnesota will look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers . Portland will look for their second straight win on Friday against the New Orleans Pelicans .
The Indiana Pacers ( 6 - 6 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 9 - 2 ) 103 - 93 on Wednesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 30 - 19 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , as the Cavaliers could n't get anything going on the offensive end , shooting just 41 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range . Indiana was led by Paul George , who finished with 21 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , 11 rebounds , five assists and two steals in 37 minutes . Jeff Teague added 20 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and eight assists in 35 minutes , while Myles Turner added 12 points and nine rebounds in 33 minutes off the bench . Thaddeus Young was the only other player to score in double figures for the Pacers , finishing with 16 points and six rebounds . For the Cavaliers , Kevin Love led the way with 27 points ( 11 - 23 FG ), 13 rebounds and four assists , in 38 minutes of action . Kyrie Irving followed up with a near double - double of his own , totaling 27 points and seven assists . Tristan Thompson finished with 13 points , nine rebounds and two blocks in 28 minutes of play . Iman Shumpert finished with 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG  , 1 - 2 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ), five rebounds and three assists in 27 minutes ; Richard Jefferson finished with nine points ( 5 - 9 FG ). The Cavaliers head to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Friday night , and the Pacers head to New York to play the Knicks on Friday evening .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host Detroit Pistons , 97 - 96 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Wednesday . The Jazz ( 3 - 4 ) came into Wednesday 's contest as one of the hottest teams in the NBA , having won three of their last four games . They did n't disappoint in this one , however , as they were able to hold off the Pistons in the fourth quarter . Utah was led by Gordon Hayward , who finished with 17 points , five rebounds and four assists . He 's now averaging 17 points and 6 rebounds on the season . Enes Kanter was right behind him , finishing with 16 points and 12 rebounds . Derrick Favors was the only other Jazz player in double figures , totaling 14 points and 11 rebounds on 6 - of - 11 shooting . Brandon Jennings led the way for the Pistons ( 2 - four ) with 23 points and five assists , while Greg Monroe finished with 19 points . It was his second double - double in the last three games , and he 's averaging 19 points and 10 rebounds on this year . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope finished with 11 points and four rebounds , but he shot just 3 - for - 13 from the field . Andre Drummond finished with an 11 - point , 18 - rebound double - doubles that also included two blocks and two steals . Drummond has now recorded at least 10 rebounds in all three games this season and is averaging 11 rebounds and 2 blocks per game .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 47 - 27 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 50 ) 99 - 79 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Clippers have now won three straight games , as they continue to battle for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference . Chris Paul led the way for Los Angeles , scoring a game - high 23 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting , to go along with 11 assists , three rebounds and two steals . DeAndre Jordan added a double - double of his own , posting 17 points and 16 rebounds . Jamal Crawford led the second unit with 17 points , while J.J. Redick chipped in 17 points off the bench . For the Timberwolves , Karl-Anthony Towns was the player of the game . Towns finished with 23 points and 11 rebounds , and Ricky Rubio added nine points and nine assists . Andrew Wiggins was the only other player to score in double digits for Minnesota , finishing with seven points . Up next for the Clippers is a road matchup against the Golden State Warriors on Friday . Minnesota is in the midst of a three - game losing streak , but they 'll look to get back on track on Friday when they take on the New Orleans Pelicans in their next game , also at the Smoothie King Center . They 'll be without Zach LaVine ( ankle ) for the second game in a row as he continues to recover from an ankle injury .

They were able to hold off the Thunder in the second quarter , however , as they went on to out - score them 42 - 28 in the period . The Golden State Warriors ( 16 - 3 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 12 - 7 ) 127 - 132 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors were expected to win this game easily , but the Rockets made a run in the fourth quarter to make it a one - point game . However , the Warriors were able to pull away in the final period , outscoring the Rockets 31 - 19 to seal the win . Golden State was led by Kevin Durant , who scored a game - high 39 points on 12 - of - 28 shooting . Durant also added 14 rebounds , three assists and two steals . Stephen Curry was next with 28 points , five rebounds and five assists . Draymond Green added 20 points and 15 rebounds . Klay Thompson added 15 points . Shaun Livingston led the second unit with 10 points and six assists , while Marreese Speights chipped in 10 points off the bench . James Harden led the way for the Rockets with 29 points on 9 - of -- 18 shooting , to go along with seven rebounds and six steals , in 35 minutes . Clint Capela added 13 points and 10 rebounds ; Trevor Ariza chipped in 12 points and five rebounds  , and Ryan Anderson chipped in 13 points on 5 - of- 8 shooting ; in 29 minutes , he also added four rebounds and three assists in the loss . Houston will look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers .Golden State will host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 25 - 34 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 13 - 46 ) 94 - 74 on Friday . Indiana has won four of their last five games . Roy Hibbert led the way for the Pacers with 14 points and 15 rebounds in 31 minutes . George Hill added 17 points and eight assists in 32 minutes , while David West chipped in eight points and six rebounds in 29 minutes off the bench . The Pacers shot 41 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . Philadelphia was led by Nerlens Noel , who finished with 19 points , five rebounds , four assists , two steals and a block . Robert Covington chipped in 12 points and seven rebounds . Dario Saric led the second unit with 10 points and five rebounds in 22 minutes ; Jahlil Okafor finished with eight points . Isaiah Canaan was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 11 points and three assists . Up next for the 76ers is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday . Meanwhile , the Pacers will look to extend their winning streak to five games when they take on the Orlando Magic on Saturday . This marks the second of a back - to - back set for Indiana , and they 'll look to continue their winning ways when they play host to the Charlotte Hornets on Monday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 25 - 20 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 22 - 22 ) 108 - 98 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Thunder 37 - 22 in the first quarter . They were able to hold off the Thunder in the second quarter , however , as they went on to out - score them 37 - 23 in the period . LeBron James led the way for Cleveland , scoring 34 points ( 11 - 25 FG , 7 - 10 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds , five assists and two steals . Kyrie Irving added 21 points ( 9 - 21 FG ) and six assists , while Kevin Love added 19 points ( 6 - 10 FG ), 13 rebounds and three blocks . Timofey Mozgov added 14 points and six rebounds . Cleveland has now won four of their last five games . Russell Westbrook led the Thunder with 32 points ( 12 - 23 FG  , 5 - 7 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ). Kevin Durant was right behind him with 22 points ( 7 - 15 FG ). Serge Ibaka finished with 15 points ( 5 - 16 FG and 3 - 4 FT ), nine rebounds and four assists . Enes Kanter was the only other Thunder player in double figures , finishing with 11 points ( 4 - 8 FG .<n> The Thunder will look to bounce back on Friday in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans . the Cavaliers will host the Orlando Magic on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 32 - 33 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 27 - 38 ) 102 - 95 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Bucks have now won three of their last four games , as they continue to battle for a playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee with 18 points , seven rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block in 40 minutes . Tony Snell added 19 points and six assists in 28 minutes , while Matthew Dellavedova chipped in 16 points and seven assists . Khris Middleton added 11 points and nine rebounds in 33 minutes off the bench . Andrew Wiggins led the Timberwolves in scoring with 22 points . Karl-Anthony Towns added 14 points and 10 rebounds . Gorgui Dieng chipped in 12 points and four rebounds in 24 minutes ; Shabazz Muhammad led the second unit with 11 points in 23 minutes off a bench role . Minnesota has now lost four of its last five games . They head to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Friday . Milwaukee has now won five of its past six games and sits in third place in the Western Conference 's Central Division . Next up , the Bucks will host the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday for their next game . This marks the second game in a row the Bucks have defeated the Timberwolves , and they 'll look to extend their winning streak to three games on Friday as well .

The Nets came into Wednesday 's contest on a two - game losing streak , but they were able to get back on track with a win over the Raptors . Brook Lopez led the way for Brooklyn with 30 points on 13 - of - 24 shooting and 17 rebounds in 44 minutes . Deron Williams added 31 points and 11 assists in 38 minutes , while Thaddeus Young chipped in 29 points and six rebounds in 37 minutes off the bench . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors with 27 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two steals . Terrence Ross chipped in 23 points and four rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas finished with 21 points and nine rebounds in 35 minutes ; Kyle Lowry chipped in 20 points and eight assists . Toronto has now lost three of their last four games , as they continue to battle for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . They head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday . Brooklyn has now won four of its last five games and will look to keep that momentum going on Friday against the Knicks .

The Pelicans got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Hornets 34 - 21 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the second half , as the Hornets could n't get anything going on the offensive end , shooting just 41 percent from the field . In fact , the Pelicans outscored the Hornets , 33 - 21 , in the fourth quarter to seal the win . Miles was the only other player to score in double figures , as he finished with 16 points on 5 - for - 14 shooting . Game 1 was close throughout the game , but the Raptors came out on top in the fourth quarter , outscoring the Pacers by a 34 - 19 margin . Toronto will look to extend the series in Game 2 .

However , the Magic were able to pull away in the final period , as they outscored the Pistons 31 - 17 to seal the win . Tobias Harris led the Magic in scoring , finishing with 24 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds , three assists and one steal . Nikola Vucevic finished second on the team , totaling 14 points and 14 rebounds . Evan Fournier finished with 14 points , five rebounds and six assists . Elfrid Payton was the only other starter in double figures , amassing 11 points and seven assists , in 32 minutes off the bench . Brandon Jennings led the Pistons in scoring with 18 points . Andre Drummond finished with 12 points and 10 rebounds in 28 minutes . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope finished with 10 points and five rebounds in 34 minutes , while Greg Monroe was held to six points on 2 - of - 9 shooting . Jon Leuer led the second unit with 20 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) and seven rebounds in 27 minutes off a bench role .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 6 - 15 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 10 - 12 ) 110 - 105 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Rockets 31 - 22 in the first quarter . They were able to hold off the Rockets in the second quarter , as well , to take a nine - point lead into the half . In the second half , the Rockets were unable to get anything going , allowing the Nets to out - score them by a score of 56 - 43 . Houston was led by James Harden , who scored a game - high 35 points on 10 - of - 22 shooting . He also added nine rebounds , six assists , two steals and two blocks . Dwight Howard was right behind him with 22 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Trevor Ariza was next with a near double - double of his own , scoring 10 points and grabbing nine boards . Clint Capela was the only other starter to score in double figures for the Rockets , finishing with eight points and nine rebounds in 34 minutes . Bojan Bogdanovic led the way for the Nets with 19 points and five rebounds . Thaddeus Young was next in line with 20 points and 12 boards , while Jarrett Jack chipped in 10 points . Brook Lopez finished with 24 points and eight rebounds in 39 minutes , and Joe Johnson added 22 points in 43 minutes off the bench . Brooklyn will look to build off this win on Friday , when they host the Los Angeles Clippers . Meanwhile , Houston will have a few days off before hosting the Minnesota Timberwolves on Saturday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 50 - 22 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 35 - 37 ) 113 - 91 on Friday . Russell Westbrook led the way for the Thunder with 15 points , nine assists , seven rebounds , two steals and one block in 27 minutes . Kevin Durant followed up with 20 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting , while Steven Adams added 14 points and seven boards . Enes Kanter was the only other Thunder player to score in double figures , with 17 points off the bench . Oklahoma City has now won four of its last five games , as it continues to battle for the eighth seed in the Western Conference standings . The Jazz have now lost three of their last four games . Gordon Hayward led the team with 21 points on 8 - of- 22 shooting . Shelvin Mack was next with 17 , and Derrick Favors finished with 16 points . Utah will host the Los Angeles Clippers on Sunday , in a matchup of two of the top two teams in the West . Meanwhile , the Thunder will travel to Phoenix to take on the Suns on Sunday in a battle of the two top teams in their respective conferences , also in a bid to keep pace with the Warriors for the final playoff spot in the NBA , which is currently held by the Golden State Warriors , who hold the tiebreaker over the Thunder over the Warriors .

The Clippers got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Grizzlies 30 - 16 in the first quarter . They were able to hold off the Grizzlies in the second quarter , however , as they went on to out - score them 30 - 19 in the period . This was a huge win for the Clippers , who have now won four of their last five games . Redick was right behind him with 19 points ( 5 - 13 FG ), nine assists , three rebounds and three steals , in 37 mins . They 'll look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 2 - 1 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 1 - 2 ) 95 - 87 on Wednesday in Game 2 of the Western Conference first - round playoffs at the TD Garden in Boston . The Spurs were able to hold off the Celtics in the fourth quarter , outscoring them 31 - 21 , to take a two - game lead in the series . Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Spurs , as he tallied 19 points , eight rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block in 34 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge followed up with a double - double of his own , totaling 14 points and 10 rebounds in 35 minutes , while Tony Parker chipped in 13 points and six assists . Tim Duncan was the only other starter in double figures , amassing 10 points and eight rebounds in 29 minutes off the bench . For the Celtics , they were led by Avery Bradley , who finished with 18 points and four rebounds in 30 minutes of action . Marcus Smart was next with 17 points and five assists in 39 minutes of play . Tyler Zeller and Jae Crowder were next with matching 15 - point efforts , with the former adding eight rebounds and the latter providing four rebounds and four assists in 23 minutes of playing time . Up next , the Spurs will host the Golden State Warriors on Friday , and the Celtics will travel to Oklahoma City to take on the Thunder on Saturday .

Otto Porter was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 14 points on 5 - of - 17 shooting . Carmelo Anthony was the high - point man for the Knicks ( 24 - 32 ) , with 33 points on 12 - of- 22 shooting , to go along with four rebounds and four assists . Kristaps Porzingis finished with 20 points on 8 - of -- 14 shooting and added five rebounds in 30 minutes . Arron Afflalo finished with 11 points and three assists ; Robin Lopez finished with a 14 - point , 8 - rebound double - double . Brandon Jennings led the second unit with 13 points and four rebounds ; Willy Hernangomez finished with 12 points and 11 rebounds  . New York will host the Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday . Washington will visit the Boston Celtics on Sunday for their next game .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 32 - 14 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 28 - 20 ) 107 - 91 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers were expected to win this game easily , but the Thunder were able to keep it close for the majority of the game . In fact , the Cavaliers led by as many as 20 points in the first half , and the Thunder never led by more than eight points in any quarter . Cleveland was able to pull away in the fourth quarter , as they outscored Oklahoma City 37 - 16 . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers with 25 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , eight rebounds and eight assists in 37 minutes . Kyrie Irving was next with 29 points ( 12 - 22 FG ) and 10 assists in 35 minutes , while Iman Shumpert added 16 points ( 5 - 11 FG ), three rebounds and three assists in 34 minutes  . Tristan Thompson added 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG  , 1 - 2 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ), 11 rebounds , two assists and two steals in 34 mins . Kevin Love finished with 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG ; 1 - 1 FT ). The Cavaliers shot 45 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Oklahoma City was led by Russell Westbrook , who finished with 26 points ( 10 - 20 FG ). He also added eight rebounds . Victor Oladipo was right behind him with 17 points ( 6 - 16 FG . 3 - 6 3Pte , 2 - 2 FT .) . Steven Adams added 12 points and eight rebounds in 27 minutes ; Enes Kanter finished with 10 points ( 3 - 5 FG ); Enes Kanter also added four rebounds and two assists in 24 minutes off the bench . On deck for the Thunder is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 2 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 1 - 1 ) 113 - 103 on Wednesday in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs at TD Garden in Boston . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors with 23 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting , to go along with seven rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 35 minutes . Kyle Lowry followed up with 21 points , six rebounds and seven assists , while Jonas Valanciunas chipped in 18 points and 10 rebounds . The Raptors shot 44 percent from the field , including 43 percent from three - point range . Toronto also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 51 - 38 . Boston was led by Avery Bradley , who finished with 13 points . He also added five rebounds and three assists . Marcus Smart was right behind him with 18 points on 6 - of- 11 shooting . Tyler Zeller was the only other Celtics player to score in double figures , with 10 points on 4 - of – 8 shooting ; he also added four rebounds ; two assists ; and two blocks . Jae Crowder was next with seven points ; while Kelly Olynyk and Marcus Smart each scored 11 points off the bench . Up next , the Raptors will host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , and the Celtics will visit the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday .

Up next for the Magic is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . Cleveland is off until Friday , when they host the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 8 - 2 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 2 - 8 ) 93 - 90 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Hawks got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Heat 40 - 23 in the first quarter . In fact , the Hawks led by as many as 20 points in the second quarter , as they went on to out - score the Heat by a margin of 35 - 19 . They were able to hold the Heat to just 40 percent shooting from the field and 18 percent from three - point range , while the Hawks shot 46 percent from the floor and 35 percent from beyond the arc . Atlanta was led by Paul Millsap , who finished with 18 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals . Dwight Howard was right behind him with 15 points and 11 rebounds . Dennis Schroder was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 18 points and seven assists . Kent Bazemore finished with 12 points and five assists , and Kyle Korver chipped in 11 points . For the Heat , Hassan Whiteside led the way with 19 points and 15 rebounds in 38 minutes . Dion Waiters was second on the team with 11 points in 34 minutes off the bench . Goran Dragic led the team in scoring with 14 points and four assists ; Tyler Johnson was next with 13 points and six rebounds ; and Josh Richardson finished with a team - high 19 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting . Miami will look to get back on track on Friday in a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .

The Dallas Mavericks ( 9 - 21 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 22 - 9 ) 90 - 88 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Mavericks came into this game as one of the hottest teams in the NBA , having won six of their last seven games . They were able to pull out this win despite being without Dirk Nowitzki ( knee ) for the second straight game . Harrison Barnes led the way for Dallas with 24 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds , two assists and one steal . Deron Williams added 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG ) and six assists , while Raymond Felton chipped in eight points ( 3 - 11 FG ), four rebounds and four assists . Wesley Matthews was the only other player in double figures for the Mavericks , as he finished with 17 points ( 7 - 12 FG  , 1 - 2 3Pte , 2 - 2 FT ). The Mavericks shot 43 percent from the field and 45 percent from beyond the arc as a team . Los Angeles has now lost two straight games , but they 're still in first place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division . DeAndre Jordan was the player of the game for the Clippers . He finished with a double - double of 14 points and 17 rebounds in 34 minutes . JJ Redick was second on the team with 11 points ( 4 - 10 FG ). He also added five assists and three steals . Jamal Crawford led the team in scoring off the bench , finishing with 16 points , six rebounds and three assists in 29 minutes , in his second game back from a knee injury . Next up , the Clippers will travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , and the Mavericks will head to Phoenix to play the Suns on Saturday .

The Hawks have now won three straight games , while the Cavaliers have now lost four in a row . Wednesday 's game was a battle between two of the best teams in the Eastern Conference , and the Hawks were able to come out on top . Atlanta shot 51 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , compared to Cleveland 's 37 percent shooting from the floor and 37 percent from beyond the arc . Paul Millsap led the way for the Hawks with 21 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , seven rebounds , four assists and two steals , in 36 minutes . Dwight Howard was second on the team with 22 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) and 14 rebounds . Kent Bazemore was right behind him with a near double - double of his own , totaling 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG ), seven rebounds and four assists , , as well as two steals and a block , over 32 minutes , off the bench . Thabo Sefolosha was the only other starter to score in double figures , with 10 points , five rebounds and three assists . Dennis Schroder was the third member of the starting five to reach double figures in points with 10 , along with four rebounds and five assists  , but he shot just 5 - for - 16 from the free throw line . Kyrie Irving led the Cavaliers with 29 points ( 11 - 27 FG . 7 - 14 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ), along with seven assists and four steals . LeBron James was next with 23 points ( eight - 17 FG ). Kevin Love was right beside him with 24 points ( seven - 17 , 6 - 12 FG ; 1 - 1 3Pte , 2 - 2 FT ). Tristan Thompson was next in line with 25 points ( 10 - 14 FG ); 13 rebounds and two blocks , to go along with three steals and two blocked shots , on 11 - of - 25 shooting . J.R. Smith had a modest six points ( 2 - 13 , 0 - 3 3PT ) but hauled in 15 rebounds and dished out three assists in 32 minutes as well . Kyle Korver led the second unit with 13 points . Cleveland will look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks .

The Pistons got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Lakers 31 - 19 in the first quarter . They never looked back , as they went on to out - score the Lakers 52 - 32 in the second half . Ish Smith had a nice game off the bench with 19 points , five rebounds and four assists in 23 minutes . D'Angelo Russell led the Lakers with 17 points ( 5 - 13 FG ; 1 - 3 3Pte , 2 - 2 FT ). Julius Randle had 15 points ( 4 - 10 FG ); Nick Young had 12 points ( 3 - 8 FG ] , nine rebounds and one assist . Jordan Clarkson had 10 points ( 1 - 4 FG .<n> The Lakers will look to get out of this slump on Friday when they take on the New Orleans Pelicans . Meanwhile , the Pistons will have a few days off before hosting the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

McConnell was second on the team , with 11 points ( 4 - 8 FG  , 1 - 2 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ). The San Antonio Spurs ( 43 - 8 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 11 - 42 ) 106 - 102 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , as they outscored the Lakers 30 - 19 in the final 12 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs , scoring 26 points on 11 - of - 18 shooting , to go along with nine rebounds , three assists and two steals . Kawhi Leonard added 20 points and 13 rebounds . Tony Parker added 14 points , four rebounds and four assists , while Danny Green chipped in 11 points . San Antonio has now won four straight games . Kobe Bryant led the Lakers with 25 points on 9 - of- 28 shooting . Lou Williams added 21 points ; Jordan Clarkson chipped in 14 . Julius Randle added 15 points and 15 rebounds in the loss . Los Angeles has now lost three straight games and five of their last six . They play the second game of a back - to - back on Friday against the Phoenix Suns . This was the Spurs ' fourth straight win , and they 'll look to keep it going on Friday when they host the New Orleans Pelicans . It was a tough task for the Lakers on Wednesday , but they did a good job of hanging with the Spurs in the second half . Up next , the Spurs will look to extend their winning streak to five games when they take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Toronto Raptors , 105 - 96 , at Air Canada Centre on Friday . The Wizards ( 36 - 23 ) have now won three straight games , as they continue to battle for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . They were led by John Wall , who finished with 23 points , nine assists , four rebounds and two steals . Bradley Beal followed with 17 points and five rebounds , while Markieff Morris chipped in 13 points and eight rebounds . Otto Porter , Jr. chipped in with 13 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting , and Marcin Gortat finished with a double - double of his own , totaling 12 points and 12 rebounds in 33 minutes . Washington shot 48 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors ( 35 - 25 ) with 24 points and 10 assists . Serge Ibaka followed up with 22 points and 13 rebounds ; Jonas Valanciunas finished with seven points and 11 boards . Cory Joseph chipped in 11 points and four assists ; Norman Powell led the bench with 21 points . Toronto has now lost four of its last five games . It 's unclear if Kyle Lowry will be able to return to action , but the Raptors will look to get back on track on Sunday in a home matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers .

The Celtics ( 1 - 1 ) took care of business in the first half , outscoring the Nets ( 0 - 0 ) , 32 - 18 , to take a 30 - point lead into the locker room . Avery Bradley and Rajon Rondo each scored 15 points for the Celtics . Jeff Green led the second unit with 17 points . Marcus Smart led the bench with 12 points and five assists , and Jae Crowder added 10 points in 24 minutes off the bench .

The Dallas Mavericks ( 12 - 5 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 13 - 3 ) 106 - 102 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Mavericks came into Wednesday 's contest as one of the hottest teams in the NBA , having won six of their last seven games . They were able to pull out the win against the Raptors despite being without Dirk Nowitzki ( knee ) , who is expected to be out until at least the end of the month . Dallas was able to take advantage of the absence of the All-Star forward , as they shot 47 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range , while holding the Raptors to 42 percent shooting from the floor and 28 percent from beyond the arc . Chandler Parsons led the way for the Mavericks with a game - high 30 points ( 11 - 19 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds , in 36 minutes . Monta Ellis followed up with a 30 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds and two steals , and Devin Harris chipped in 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) to go along with seven rebounds and four assists , on 7 - of - 11 shooting . Tyson Chandler was next with 14 points ( 5 - 7 FG ), 11 rebounds and three blocks , along with a steal , a steal and a block . Dirk Nowitzki finished with 15 points ( 4 - 14 FG  , 0 - 1 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ), five rebounds and an assist , but was unable to get the job done on the defensive end , allowing Toronto to pull away in the fourth quarter . Kyle Lowry led the Raptors with 25 points ( 9 - 22 FG . 3 - 10 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ). He also added six rebounds and six assists . Jonas Valanciunas finished with eight points ( 2 - 5 FG ). Terrence Ross was the only other starter in double figures , with seven points ( 3 - 8 FG ; 1 - 1 FT .) and nine rebounds . DeMar DeRozan finished with 20 points ( 8 - 20 FG ); he also added four assists and a rebound . Amir Johnson and Terrence Ross combined for just nine points . Toronto will look to bounce back on Friday when they host the New Orleans Pelicans .

Golden State has now won six straight games , as they continue to dominate in the Western Conference . The Warriors shot 52 percent from the field , while the Suns shot just 45 percent . Klay Thompson led the way for Golden State with 43 points on 15 - of - 22 shooting . Stephen Curry added 25 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . Draymond Green added 16 points and 11 rebounds . Andrew Bogut added 21 points and 12 rebounds , and Marreese Speights chipped in 25 points off the bench . Phoenix was led by Eric Bledsoe , who finished with 24 points . Brandon Knight followed up with 17 points and eight assists , . Tyson Chandler had 11 points and nine rebounds ; Jon Leuer finished with 12 points and seven rebounds in 24 minutes . Devin Booker led the second unit with 15 points and five rebounds in 29 minutes , but the SunS could n't keep up with the Warriors . They 'll look to get back on track on Friday when they host the Los Angeles Clippers . Warriors will look to extend their winning streak to seven games on Saturday when they take on the New Orleans Pelicans .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 15 - 15 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 12 - 18 ) 109 - 108 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Hawks came into Wednesday 's contest as a double - digit favorite , but were able to hold off the Nuggets in the fourth quarter to secure the win . Atlanta was led by Paul Millsap , who finished with 20 points , eight rebounds , four assists , two steals and a block . Millsap also added a pair of blocks and a steal . Dennis Schroder followed up with a near double - double of his own , totaling 27 points and nine assists . Kent Bazemore chipped in 20 points and five rebounds . Thabo Sefolosha finished with 12 points and eight rebounds in his return to the starting lineup . Danilo Gallinari led the way for the Nuggets with 21 points . Wilson Chandler finished with 19 points and 11 rebounds in 27 minutes . Emmanuel Mudiay finished with 17 points and 10 assists in 28 minutes of action . Nikola Jokic finished with eight points and six rebounds in 19 minutes of play . Will Barton led the second unit with 13 points and four rebounds in 21 minutes off the bench . Denver will look to get back on track on Friday when they take on the Los Angeles Clippers in their next game at home . Meanwhile , the Hawks will host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 14 - 27 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 13 - 30 ) 114 - 99 on Friday . Anthony Davis led the way for the Pelicans with 35 points on 13 - of - 22 shooting , to go along with 13 rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block , in 37 minutes . Tyreke Evans followed up with 13 points , while Eric Gordon chipped in 11 points . The Pelicans shot 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range . New Orleans has won three of their last four games . Karl-Anthony Towns led the Timberwolves with 21 points and nine rebounds . Andrew Wiggins followed with 20 points and five assists . Shabazz Muhammad was the only other player in double figures for Minnesota , with 15 points off the bench . Minnesota has now lost four of its last five games , as they continue to struggle on the road . They 'll look to bounce back on Sunday when they host the Los Angeles Clippers . This was the Pelicans ' second game in three nights , and they were able to pull away in the fourth quarter . Jrue Holiday led the second unit with 17 points and seven assists in 28 minutes , along with five rebounds and two steals . Eric Gordon added 11 points on 4 - of- 9 shooting and three assists in 25 minutes of action . It was his second double - double in a row , after scoring 13 points on Wednesday against the New York Knicks . He 's now averaging 13 points and 4 assists on the season .

The Knicks got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Bulls 31 - 19 in the first quarter , and never looked back . Mike Dunleavy finished with nine points and nine rebounds . Chicago has now lost four of its last five games , as they continue to struggle on the road . They play the second game of a back - to - back on Friday when they take on the Atlanta Hawks at the United Center . Meanwhile , the Knicks will look to continue their winning ways on Friday , when they host the Philadelphia 76ers , who are currently in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division .
The Detroit Pistons ( 12 - 11 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 11 - 10 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Pistons got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 32 - 19 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on throughout the rest of the game , as they held a double - digit lead for the majority of the second half . In fact , the Pistons led by as many as 20 points in the fourth quarter , but the Bulls fought back to make it a one - point game with just over a minute remaining . Dwyane Wade was able to hit a three - pointer to tie the game at 91 with just under a minute to go . Tobias Harris then hit a pair of free throws to put the Pistons up by two , and the Bulls could n't get a shot to fall in the final seconds . Harris finished with 22 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , seven rebounds and seven assists in 40 minutes , while Kentavious Caldwell-Pope added 12 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and three assists in 31 minutes . Reggie Jackson was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with seven points ( 7 - 18 FG ), seven assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 22 minutes of action . Andre Drummond was the high - point man for the Pistons , totaling 15 points and 15 rebounds in 25 minutes of play . He 's now averaging 15 points , 15 rebounds and 2 blocks on the season . Marcus Morris was second on the team , with 13 points and five rebounds in 26 minutes of work . Detroit will look to build off this win on Friday in a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans . Chicago will have a few days off before hosting the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Raptors got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Hawks 37 - 27 in the first quarter . They never looked back , as they went on to out - score the Hawks 51 - 35 in the second quarter and 36 - 26 in the third . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors , scoring a game - high 33 points on 12 - of - 22 shooting . Kyle Lowry was right behind him with 21 points , while Jonas Valanciunas added a double - double of his own , totaling 11 points and 15 rebounds . Terrence Ross chipped in with 22 points and six rebounds , and DeMarre Carroll chipped in 14 points . Toronto has now won six of their last seven games . Atlanta has now lost four of its last five games , but they still hold the eighth seed in the Eastern Conference . Jeff Teague led the Hawks in scoring with 24 points on 7 - for - 14 shooting , to go along with five assists , three rebounds and two steals . Al Horford added 23 points and nine boards . Paul Millsap was second on the team with eight points and four rebounds in 36 minutes . Dennis Schroder led the second unit with 17 points and five assists in 34 minutes , along with four rebounds and three assists . Up next for the Hawks is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Friday .

Harden added nine assists  and five rebounds ; Donatas Motiejunas scored 13 points ; Trevor Ariza scored 10 , and Terrence Jones had 10 . Eric Gordon was the only other starter in double figures , scoring 10 points off the bench . Houston has now lost four of its last five games . They 'll look to get back on track on Sunday in a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers . Meanwhile , the Jazz will look to extend their winning streak to five games when they host the Denver Nuggets on Sunday , as they 're currently in second place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division .

The Suns got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the 76ers 34 - 17 in the first quarter . They never looked back , as they went on to out - score the Sixers by a margin of 34 - 19 in the second quarter , which was the difference in the game . Michael Carter-Williams was second on the team , with 21 points , five assists and four rebounds in 32 minutes  . He 'd scored at least 20 points in three of his last four games and is now averaging 18 points and 7 assists on the year . Robert Covington was next , posting a double - double with 12 points and 10 rebounds . It was a disappointing night for the Sixers , who will look to get out of this slide on Friday in a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans .

Mason Plumlee was the only other Blazer to score in double figures , as he finished with 10 points and 10 rebounds in 25 minutes . Portland has now won three of its last four games , and is now just a half game behind the eighth - place Los Angeles Clippers in the Western Conference standings . Carmelo Anthony led the Knicks with 23 points . He shot 10 - for - 20 from the field and 4 - for- 10 from the three - point line . Arron Afflalo was next with 13 points and five assists , in 36 minutes off the bench . Kristaps Porzingis and Robin Lopez combined for just 11 points on 4 - of- 10 shooting . New York has now lost four of their last five games and is currently in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They will look to bounce back on Friday when they host the Atlanta Hawks .

They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , as the Pistons could n't get anything going on the offensive end . The Golden State Warriors ( 10 - 2 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 12 ) 91 - 86 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Warriors have now won three straight games , as they continue to ride the hot hand of star point guard Stephen Curry . Curry scored a game - high 30 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting , while also adding seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . Golden State shot 36 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range , but they were able to hold off the Thunder in the fourth quarter . Oklahoma City was led by a 22 - point , 11 - rebound double - double from point guard Reggie Jackson . It was the second time this season that Jackson has scored at least 22 points , and the third time in the last four games that he 's scored 20 or more points . For the Thunder , meanwhile , it was a disappointing night on the offensive end . Center Steven Adams was the only player to score in double figures , finishing with 10 points on 4 - for - 7 shooting . Despite the loss , the Thunder are still in second place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They 'll look to bounce back on Friday when they host the Los Angeles Clippers . Meanwhile , Golden State will look to extend their winning streak to five games on Friday in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans .

Darren Collison was the only other starter in double figures for the Kings , as he finished with 11 points ; he also added seven assists . Rajon Rondo was the high - point man for the team , with 10 points and seven assists in 27 minutes , but the team shot just 46 percent and committed 18 turnovers . Up next , the Spurs will host the Phoenix Suns on Sunday , and the Kings will visit the Los Angeles Clippers on Sunday as well , to take on the second - place Lakers in the Western Conference standings , also in the second half of a back - to - back .
