The Atlanta Hawks ( 33 - 26 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 38 - 22 ) 114 - 98 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Hawks came into Wednesday 's contest on a two - game losing streak , but they were able to get back on track with a big win over the Celtics . Paul Millsap led the way for Atlanta , scoring a game - high 29 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting , to go along with seven rebounds , three assists and two steals . Dennis Schroder added 17 points , five assists and three rebounds . Dwight Howard was second on the team with 12 points and 12 rebounds ; he 's now recorded double - doubles in three of his last four games . Kent Bazemore added 16 points . Atlanta has now won four of its last five games , as it continues to battle for the eighth seed in the Eastern Conference . Isaiah Thomas led the Celtics with 19 points and seven assists , while Al Horford added six points and six rebounds in 28 minutes . Jae Crowder was second in the starting lineup with 16 points and four assists . Boston has now lost four of their last five . They 'll look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Orlando Magic . Meanwhile , the Hawks will look to keep rolling on Friday when they host the New Orleans Pelicans .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 38 - 11 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 31 ) 102 - 86 on Friday . San Antonio has now won four straight games . Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Spurs with 19 points , eight rebounds and four assists . The Spurs shot 43 percent from the field , while the Sixers shot just 34 percent . Tony Parker was the only other starter in double figures for San Antonio , as he scored 19 points to go along with six assists and six rebounds . Dewayne Dedmon was the high - point man for the Sixers , with 13 points . Dario Saric was second on the team , totaling 12 points and seven rebounds , in 29 minutes . Ersan Ilyasova was next with 11 points and eight boards . Jahlil Okafor finished with nine points and nine boards , but shot just 3 - of - 12 . Robert Covington led the second unit with 12 points off the bench . Philadelphia has now lost four straight and seven of their last eight . They 'll look to get back on track on Sunday when they host the New Orleans Pelicans . the Spurs will look to extend their winning streak to five games on Saturday when they take on the Phoenix Suns , who are currently in last place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division .
The Chicago Bulls ( 24 - 16 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 22 - 19 ) 111 - 101 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Bulls came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but were able to hold off the Pistons in the fourth quarter . Chicago was able to out - rebound Detroit 52 - 38 , and they were also able to shoot 52 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . This was a huge win for the Bulls , who have now won three of their last four games . Jimmy Butler led the way for Chicago , scoring 31 points ( 13 - 18 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds and six assists . Pau Gasol was right behind him with 31 points and 10 rebounds , while Derrick Rose chipped in 20 points ( 9 - 17 FG ) and seven assists , in 33 minutes . Taj Gibson was the only other starter in double figures , as he scored 16 points ( 8 - 12 FG ), to go with 10 rebounds and three assists  . It was a nice bounce back game for Gibson , after he scored just four points in the Bulls ' last game , a loss to the Nets on Saturday . Ersan Ilyasova was the Pistons ' best player , with 19 points ( eight - 16 FG  , 1 - 2 3Pte , 8 - 11 FT ), 11 rebounds and four assists ; he 's now averaging 19 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Reggie Jackson was second on the team , totaling 19 points , six assists and six rebounds . Andre Drummond had a nice game as well , posting 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG ). He 's been playing some of his best basketball of the season of late , averaging 16 points and 16 rebounds over his last three games , so it was good to see him get back on track . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope was next with 14 points ( 6 - 13 FG .<n> The Pistons will look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Knicks .
The New York Knicks defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 102 - 94 , at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday . The Knicks ( 6 - 6 ) have now won three straight games , as they continue to find their rhythm after a slow start to the season . Carmelo Anthony led the way with 18 points on 6 - of - 18 shooting , while Kristaps Porzingis added 29 points and 11 rebounds . Arron Afflalo added 16 points , and Jose Calderon chipped in eight points . New York shot 40 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Kemba Walker led the team with 31 points and eight assists . Nicolas Batum added 18 points and five rebounds , but the Hornets shot just 44 percent on the night . Charlotte has now lost four of their last five games . They 'll look to get back on track on Friday in a road matchup against the Orlando Magic . Meanwhile , the Knicks will look to continue their winning ways on Friday when they take on the Washington Wizards at home in their next game . This marks the first time this season that the Knicks have won three in a row at home . Robin Lopez was the only starter to score in double figures for New York , finishing with four points and seven rebounds in 24 minutes . Derrick Williams led the second unit with 10 points off the bench . Up next for the Knicks is a home matchup with the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 16 - 10 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 21 - 6 ) 105 - 91 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers were expected to win this game easily , but the Grizzlies made a run in the fourth quarter to make it a one - point game with just over a minute remaining . However , LeBron James and Kyrie Irving were able to put the game away with a pair of free throws . James finished with 25 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , 11 rebounds , five assists and two steals , while Irving finished with 17 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) and 11 assists , in 37 minutes . Kevin Love was the only other Cleveland player to score in double figures , as he finished with eight points ( 4 - 9 FG ), eight rebounds and two assists . Cleveland has now won four of their last five games , and they 'll look to keep rolling on Friday when they host the Milwaukee Bucks . Memphis has now lost two straight games after winning their first three games of the season . Mike Conley led the way for the Grizzlies , with 23 points ( 5 - 13FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ), five rebounds and four assists  , . Jon Leuer finished second on the team with 16 points ( 7 - 8 FG ). Marc Gasol finished with 10 points ( 3 - 7 FG .<n> The Grizzlies shot just 45 percent from the field . They will look to get back on track on Friday in a road matchup against the Indiana Pacers .

The Lakers got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Grizzlies 35 - 22 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the second half , as the Grizzlies could n't get anything going on the offensive end , shooting just 39 percent from the field . Timofey Mozgov finished with 14 points and five rebounds in 38 minutes , while Nick Young chipped in 20 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) and four assists in 27 minutes off the bench . For the Grizzlies , Mike Conley led the way with 21 points ( 7 - 16 FG ), seven rebounds and seven assists , in 32 minutes of action . Marc Gasol was next with 22 points ( 8 - 15 FG  , 1 - 2 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ), while JaMychal Green finished with a double - double of 14 points , 10 rebounds and five assists . Tony Allen finished with 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG ). The Grizzlies will look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers . Meanwhile , the Lakers will head to San Antonio on Friday to take on the Spurs .

The Portland Trail Blazers ( 34 - 16 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 28 - 23 ) 108 - 87 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Suns came into Wednesday 's contest on a two - game losing streak , but the Trail Blazers were able to pull away in the second half , out - scoring the Suns 37 - 19 in the fourth quarter to secure the win . Portland was led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who finished with 19 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , 13 rebounds , three assists and one steal in 35 minutes . It was Aldridge 's third double - double in the last four games , as he 's averaged 19 points and 13 rebounds over that span . Wesley Matthews was next with 14 points ( 5 - 15 FG ) and eight assists in 32 minutes , while Nicolas Batum chipped in with 17 points ( 6 - 13 FG ), seven rebounds and four assists in 36 minutes off the bench . Damian Lillard finished with 13 points , four rebounds and five assists , in 33 minutes of action . Robin Lopez was the only other Trail Blazer in double figures , with 11 points and 12 rebounds in 31 minutes of play . Eric Bledsoe led the way for Phoenix , finishing with 18 points ( 8 - 17 FG  , 0 - 1 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ), three rebounds and two assists in 37 minutes of work . Goran Dragic finished with nine points ( 4 - 11 FG ; 1 - 4 3PT and 1 - 1 FT ). The SunS shot just 39 percent from the field and 26 percent from beyond the arc . They 'll look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers . Meanwhile , the Blazers will look to continue their winning ways on Friday against the New Orleans Pelicans .

They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the second half , but the Spurs came back in the fourth quarter to tie the game at 106 with just over a minute remaining . Damian Lillard was able to hit a three - pointer to put the Trail Blazers up by one . LaMarcus Aldridge had a chance to win the game for the Spurs with two seconds remaining but missed a jumper at the buzzer . Portland has now won three of their last four games , as they continue to battle for a playoff spot in the Western Conference . Devin Harris led the second unit with 13 points on 5 - of- 7 shooting ; he also added three assists and a steal . Dallas has now lost three straight games and is currently in last place in the Southwest Division . They head to Oklahoma City to take on the Thunder on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 5 - 2 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 3 - 5 ) 94 - 92 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Grizzlies 37 - 21 in the first quarter . They were able to hold off the Grizzlies in the second quarter , however , as they went on to out - score them 41 - 26 in the period . Los Angeles was led by Chris Paul , who finished with 14 points , six assists and four rebounds in 33 minutes . Blake Griffin was next with 24 points and 12 rebounds , while DeAndre Jordan added 13 points and eight rebounds . For the Grizzlies , Marc Gasol led the way with 26 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds and four assists . Mike Conley followed up with 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG ) and six assists , and Zach Randolph finished with 18 points ( 8 - 19 , 6 - 8 FG ), six rebounds and two steals . Courtney Lee finished with 12 points and five boards . Tony Allen was the only other starter in double figures , with 10 points . Memphis will look to get back on track on Friday in a home matchup against the Phoenix Suns . LA is off until Friday , when they host the Golden State Warriors .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 15 - 29 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 16 - 32 ) 122 - 73 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Mavericks got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 32 - 18 in the first quarter . They never looked back , as they led by at least 20 points for the entirety of the second half . Dallas shot 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range , while holding the Lakers to 38 percent shooting from the floor and 38 percent from beyond the arc . Dirk Nowitzki led the way for the Mavericks with 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 20 minutes . Deron Williams chipped in 13 points , eight assists , four rebounds and two steals , and Seth Curry added 14 points ( 6 - 8 FG ) and 10 assists . Harrison Barnes was next with six points ( 3 - 12 FG ), five rebounds and one assist . Wesley Matthews led the team in scoring , dropping 13 points on 5 - 9 shooting , including 3 - 5 from long range . Brandon Ingram was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 12 points ( 4 - 12FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ), three rebounds and three assists  , along with three steals . Julius Randle led the Lakers in scoring with 20 points ( 7 - 19 FG ). He also grabbed 10 rebounds and dished out five assists in 34 minutes , but shot just 5 - 12 from the free throw line . Nick Young was next in line with 19 points ( 8 - 11FG ) to go along with six rebounds and four assists ; D'Angelo Russell chipped in 10 points ( 2 - 5 FG ; 1 - 1 FT ). The Lakers will look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers . Meanwhile , the Mavericks will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday .

New York has now lost four of their last five games . Carmelo Anthony led the team with 25 points ( 9 - 21 FG ), to go with seven rebounds and four assists . Kristaps Porzingis finished with 16 points ( 4 - 10 FG ). Derrick Rose was next with 18 points ( 6 - 11FG , 1 - 4 3Pte , 4 - 4 FT ). Willy Hernangomez finished with 12 points and nine rebounds in 29 minutes off the bench . Up next for the Knicks is a road matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday . For the Spurs , they 'll look to extend their winning streak to five games on Friday against the New Orleans Pelicans .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 55 - 10 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 32 - 31 ) 109 - 101 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Bulls 30 - 20 . San Antonio has now won four straight games , as they continue to battle for the top seed in the Western Conference . Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Spurs , scoring 29 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting . LaMarcus Aldridge was second on the team with 26 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Tony Parker was right behind him with 20 points . Tim Duncan had seven points and 10 rebounds , while Manu Ginobili scored 17 points off the bench . For the Bulls , Pau Gasol led the team in scoring , finishing with 21 points on 8 - of -- 16 shooting , to go along with eight rebounds . Derrick Rose scored 20 points on 7 - of- 11 shooting ; he also had four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Taj Gibson was the only other starter in double figures , totaling eight points and eight rebounds in the loss . Chicago will look to get back on track on Friday when they take on the Los Angeles Clippers . the Spurs will host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 51 - 11 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 25 - 38 ) 112 - 105 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Warriors have now won four straight games , as they continue to push for the top seed in the Western Conference . Stephen Curry led the way for Golden State with 31 points on 11 - of - 24 shooting , to go along with six rebounds and six assists , in 37 minutes . Klay Thompson followed up with 29 points , while Draymond Green chipped in 18 points and nine rebounds . Golden State shot 46 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range , compared to the Knicks who shot 47 percent and 27 percent , respectively . New York was led by Kristaps Porzingis , who tallied 24 points and 15 rebounds in 40 minutes of action . Carmelo Anthony followed with 15 points and six rebounds , and Derrick Rose chipped in 28 points . Lance Thomas was the only other Knicks player to score in double figures , with seven points in 27 minutes off the bench . Up next for the Warriors is a road matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . Meanwhile , the Knicks will look to get back on track on Friday when they take on the Milwaukee Bucks . This was a close game throughout , but the Warriors were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , outscoring the Knicks by a margin of 20 points in the final period . Next up for the Knicks is a home matchup with the Los Angeles Clippers on Saturday .

The Golden State Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 2 - 4 ) 108 - 95 in Game 5 of the Western Conference Finals on Sunday . The Warriors have now won three straight games , as they continue to build off of their Game 4 victory . Golden State has now won the first five games of the series by an average margin of 20 points . They have also won all five games by at least 10 points , with the only loss coming in Game 4 . Stephen Curry led the way for Golden State , scoring a game - high 39 points on 11 - of - 25 shooting . He also added eight assists , three rebounds and two steals . Draymond Green was second on the team with 20 points and 10 rebounds , while Klay Thompson scored 20 points of his own . Andrew Bogut recorded a double - double with 16 points and 12 rebounds . In fact , Golden State was able to out - score New Orleans 51 - 37 in the second half . Atlanta shot 53 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while the Magic shot 35 percent and 25 percent , respectively . Dwight Howard led the way for the Hawks with 24 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , 13 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Paul Millsap was right behind him with 21 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) and five rebounds . Dennis Schroder was next with 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG ), 10 assists , four rebounds and two steals . Kent Bazemore had eight points and three rebounds in 27 minutes off the bench . Tim Hardaway , Jr. led the Magic in scoring , dropping 21 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting . Nikola Vucevic had a double - double , totaling 16 points and 10 rebounds in 33 minutes . Elfrid Payton had 12 points and eight assists . Evan Fournier was the only other Magic player in double figures , scoring 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG ). Orlando will look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans .
The Toronto Raptors ( 34 - 16 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 24 - 27 ) 110 - 103 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Raptors came into Wednesday 's contest on a two - game losing streak , but they were able to get back on track with a win over the Trail Blazers . DeMar DeRozan led the way for Toronto , scoring 29 points on 11 - of - 25 shooting , to go along with five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Kyle Lowry followed up with 30 points , 10 assists , five rebounds and three steals , while Norman Powell chipped in 19 points off the bench . Jonas Valanciunas was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 14 points and 11 rebounds . Toronto has now won three of its last four games , as it continues to battle for the eighth seed in the Eastern Conference . Damian Lillard led the Blazers with 27 points on 8 - for - 20 shooting . C.J . McCollum was next with 21 points and six assists . Al-Farouq Aminu finished with seven points and four rebounds in 32 minutes . Portland has now lost four of their last five games . They 'll look to bounce back on Friday when they host the Los Angeles Clippers . Meanwhile , the Raptors will look to extend their winning streak to five games on Friday in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans .
The Philadelphia 76ers ( 6 - 18 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 13 - 13 ) 97 - 79 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Philadelphia has now won three of their last four games . The Sixers were led by Jahlil Okafor , who scored a game - high 26 points on 10 - of - 12 shooting . Okafor also added eight rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Robert Covington added 16 points , six rebounds and one assist . Ersan Ilyasova added 15 points and seven rebounds . Dario Saric led the second unit with 14 points . Tobias Harris led the Pistons with eight points and six rebounds in 35 minutes off the bench . Marcus Morris was next with 28 points and four rebounds in 37 minutes . Andre Drummond recorded a 14 - point , 14 - rebound double - double . Reggie Jackson scored 10 points and dished out four assists . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the bench with 12 points and three rebounds in 22 minutes , while Jon Leuer added eight points off the pine . Detroit has now lost four of its last five games , as they continue to struggle on offense . They shot 39 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range , but were out - rebounded by the 76ers by a 49 - 38 margin .
The Miami Heat ( 26 - 32 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 32 - 25 ) 108 - 90 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Heat have now won three straight games , as they continue to battle for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference standings . Dion Waiters led the way for Miami , scoring 23 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , to go along with five rebounds and four assists . Goran Dragic followed up with 23 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals . Hassan Whiteside recorded a double - double with 11 points and 10 rebounds . Tyler Johnson led the second unit with 13 points . Tim Hardaway , Jr. led the Hawks with 25 points on 3 - of – 13 shooting . Paul Millsap followed with 21 points and four rebounds ; Kent Bazemore scored 10 points and dished out three assists , while Dwight Howard recorded a 23 - point , 17 - rebound double -double . Atlanta has now lost two straight games after winning four in a row . Up next for the Hawks is a road matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday . Miami will host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday for their next game . This marks the first time the Heat have won back - to - back games this season , and they 'll look to extend their winning streak to three games when they host the Charlotte Hornets on Saturday .
The Denver Nuggets ( 32 - 35 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 20 - 47 ) 129 - 101 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Lakers 32 - 13 in the first quarter . They never looked back , as they led by as many as 29 points in the second quarter , and the Lakers could n't get closer than 20 points in this one . Denver shot 54 percent from the field , while the Lakers shot 43 percent . This was a huge win for the Nuggets , who have now won three of their last four games . Danilo Gallinari led the way for Denver with 18 points on 5 - of - 10 shooting . Mason Plumlee was right behind him with 15 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Nikola Jokic was the only other Nugget in double figures , scoring 18 points and grabbing nine rebounds . Jameer Nelson had a double - double of his own , totaling 22 points and six assists . Emmanuel Mudiay led the second unit with 22 points . Jordan Clarkson led the Lakers in scoring , dropping 19 points on 7 - for - 12 shooting , to go along with seven assists , three rebounds and one steal . Julius Randle finished with 14 points and eight boards . D'Angelo Russell led the bench with 13 points and five assists ; Jordan Clarkson finished with 12 points and seven rebounds ; Brandon Ingram finished with 11 points and three rebounds  . Los Angeles will look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 49 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 20 - 54 ) 121 - 116 on Wednesday at Target Center in Minneapolis . The Timberwolves came out strong in this game , out - scoring the Suns 40 - 22 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the second half , as they were up by double - digits by the end of the third quarter , but the Sun's Devin Booker and Alex Len made a run in the fourth . Booker finished with 30 points , nine rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks , while Len finished with 14 points and 13 rebounds . Brandon Knight was the only other Sun to score in double figures , finishing with 20 points . He also had four assists and three steals . Karl-Anthony Towns was the high - point man for the Timberwolves , with 27 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , 10 rebounds  and three blocks . Andrew Wiggins was right behind him with 32 points ( 6 - 13 FG ) and five assists . Gorgui Dieng finished with 11 points and nine rebounds in 30 minutes . Ricky Rubio had 17 points and 11 assists in 34 minutes , and Zach LaVine finished with 15 points and five rebounds in 34 . Up next , the Timberwolves will travel to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Friday . Phoenix will head home to face the Los Angeles Clippers on Saturday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) 112 - 94 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Pelicans 43 - 27 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the second half , as the Pelicans could n't get anything going on the offensive end . In fact , they shot just 40 percent from the field , while the Blazers shot 50 percent . Damian Lillard led the way for Portland , scoring 21 points on 8 - of - 21 shooting , to go along with seven assists , five rebounds and two steals . C.J . McCollum was right behind him with a 17 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and two blocks . Al-Farouq Aminu was the only other Blazer in double figures , finishing with nine points , eight rebounds , two assists and one steal . Mason Plumlee finished with seven points and six rebounds in 19 minutes off the bench . For the Pelicans , Anthony Davis was the player of the game . Davis finished with 25 points on 10 - of- 17 shooting . He was able to get to the free throw line 11 times and converted on all of them . Eric Gordon was second on the team , with 20 points and eight assists . Dante Cunningham finished with 18 points and four rebounds . Jrue Holiday was the third player in double digits for New Orleans , totaling 12 points and seven assists in the defeat . Up next for the Pelicans is a road matchup against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday . Portland will look to keep rolling on Friday against the New York Knicks .
The Golden State Warriors ( 25 - 4 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 18 - 11 ) 104 - 74 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 27 - 15 in the first quarter . They never looked back , as they went on to out - score the Jazz by a margin of 26 points in the second quarter , and the game was never in doubt after that . Golden State shot 44 percent from the field , while the Jazz shot 36 percent . Klay Thompson led the way for the Warriors , scoring 17 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting . Stephen Curry was right behind him with 25 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and four assists . Kevin Durant was next with 22 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) and five rebounds . Draymond Green finished with 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG ), 11 rebounds , four assists and two steals . Andre Iguodala and Marreese Speights each scored 15 points off the bench . Rudy Gobert was the only other Jazz player to score in double figures , finishing with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG  , 1 - 2 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ). The Jazz will look to get back on track on Friday in a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers . the Warriors will host the Phoenix Suns on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 31 - 6 ) 128 - 119 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Grizzlies got off to a hot start in this game , out - scoring the Warriors 34 - 16 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the second half , but the Warriors came back in the fourth quarter to make it a one - point game . In the end , it was the Grizzlies who came out on top , as they shot 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . Mike Conley led the way for Memphis with 27 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , six rebounds and six assists . Marc Gasol was right behind him with 23 points ( 9 - 16 FG ) and 11 rebounds . JaMychal Green finished with 19 points ( 7 - 12 FG ), nine rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Zach Randolph was the only other Grizzlies player in double figures with 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG ). The Warriors were led by Kevin Durant , who scored 27 points on 7 - 17 shooting . Klay Thompson was next with 17 points , three rebounds and two steals . Stephen Curry finished with 40 points on 15 - 27 shooting , including 5 - 13 from long distance . Draymond Green had 11 points and eight rebounds in 40 minutes . Andre Iguodala led the bench with 12 points ( 4 - 7 FG .<n> Golden State will look to bounce back on Friday when they take on the Los Angeles Clippers . Memphis will have a few days off before hosting the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
